product_name: NYX Professional MakeupRetractable Long-Lasting Mechanical Lip Liner
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackTwist & shout! NYX Professional Makeup Retractable Lip Liner combines intense pigmentation with ultimate staying power, in a smudge-proof longwear liner.
details: DetailsBenefitsTwist up mechanical lip liner pencilThis creamy lip pencil delivers intense pigmentation & precise application in an easy twist-up tube with a fine point tip that never needs sharpeningThe hydrating formula glides on effortlessly & lasts all day, this long lasting lip liner is smudge-proofFeaturing a wide variety of colored lip shades from a nude lip, red lip to a black lipDraw with your Retractable Lip Liner along lip lines or use to fill in the lip entirely, follow with your favorite lipstick or lip glossCruelty freeItem 2242520How To UseLine upper and lower lips as desired. Use with any NYX Professional Makeup lipstick or lip gloss.IngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Synthetic Beeswax, Microcrystalline Wax / Cera Microcristallina, Mica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Myristyl Lactate, C30-45 Alkyl Cetearyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Myristyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, Magnesium Silicate, Glyceryl Oleate, Citric Acid, Tin Oxide, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 6 (CI 15850), Iron Oxides (CI 77491). Red 28 lake (CI 45410).
how_to_use: Line upper and lower lips as desired. Use with any NYX Professional Makeup lipstick or lip gloss.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again
reviews.comments: Love!!

reviews.headline: Awesome lip liner
reviews.comments: Great product for a great price.  Goes on smoothly.  Does not feather on my lips.  Stays on long.

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS LIP LINER!!!!!
reviews.comments: I've been using this for several years & it's THE best liner color & you can't beat the $!!!! This liner goes perfectly with my pink lip color & I purchased a nudes gloss & it's perfect with it too!!!!!!

reviews.headline: Favorite
reviews.comments: My new go to

reviews.headline: Love this lip liner!
reviews.comments: Love this. Colors are great but they run out fast.

reviews.headline: Love NYX liners
reviews.comments: Best liners , best shades, love them

reviews.headline: I get tons of compliments on this color
reviews.comments: It's a good nude that isn't too light, too brown or too pink. I am a light/medium skin tone  for reference. The twist up liner is so convenient for an in the purse all day option.

reviews.headline: like a dry erase marker..
reviews.comments: the liner gets the job done but not without pssing you off first. it rubs away like a drh erase marker, and smudges very easily. super creamy, if you like that. but very hard to line since the point is never sharp. maybe im just an animal when i apply it lol, but it very quickly turns into a nub. it's still ok if you want to blend but there are definitely better liners out there.

reviews.headline: Breaks easily
reviews.comments:
Only 3 stars due to the liner tip breaking easy resulting in waste & needing to replace as it runs out quickly due to breaking. This is the only lip liner this has happened with. I will stick with liners that are not retractable as they last longer. 
Comparing with pricier Prestige brands I have used, the color was nice & it did have lasting effect when applied.

reviews.headline: Pretty good but
reviews.comments: Love this product! Gonna buy again for the color but it broke so much and it recently broke and now i cant use any product, didnt even do anything just broke in my make-up bag with the lid on. Very brittle

reviews.headline: Affordable long-lasting lip liner!
reviews.comments: Great lipliner!! Great pigment, and it is a pen which of course doesn't need to be sharpened  and is more convenient. Lasts a long time, and blends well with any lipgloss. Love! ðŸ’‹

reviews.headline: Test in-person, shades all wrong!
reviews.comments: Sienna is not a skin tone color but a bright RED. Please see in person these lip liner shades as I was too confident and forgot I was shopping nyx ðŸ˜­. Shades don't match pictures or description.

reviews.headline: My favorite lip liner!
reviews.comments: This is my favorite lip liner! It lasts all day.

reviews.headline: Doesn't Function
reviews.comments: Won't twist up, returning

reviews.headline: Does the job
reviews.comments: I was sold because when i swatched it on my hand, it was hard to wash off, but thats not the case when you add a gloss to your lips. Its pigmented and does the job. I would purchase again

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: My favorite lip liner. Lasts all day! I have like three off these. Global citizen is my fav.

reviews.headline: creamy
reviews.comments: glides on nice and blends really well

reviews.headline: NYX lip pencils are creamy
reviews.comments:
I like the way they go on. Rich and creamy. But the color doesn't last long enough.
I tried pencils that you have to sharpen but they are too dry.
I also tried a more expensive pencil but it didn't last any longer.
So I will stay with this one until something better comes along or they improve this one.

reviews.headline: Not true to color
reviews.comments: Bought the shade Sienna thinking it was a neutral brownish red color, but the actual shade is more like a burgundy color. The outside packaging does not match what it looks like online.

reviews.headline: Best lipliner ever!
reviews.comments: I've been buying this lipliner for years because it's waterproof and does not move EVER. I can eat dinner with this on and it does not come off. I use the color sand beige and I have an olive skin tone

natural colour lip liner
media.caption: I should have purchased a darker shade

faceoff_positive.comments: I bought the black lip-liner to go with a black lipstick (which I was struggling to find a liner to go with) I bought for Halloween. Me being me, I had to test the liner with the lipstick as soon as I got it (picture is of my trial run with the lipstick). I have absolutely no complaints. It was easy to apply, no dragging or looking too dry, and it matched the shade of lipstick perfectly.
faceoff_positive.headline: Perfect!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I love the shade range of these pencils! Since they are automatic and affordable they are almost impossible to ignore for being a great value! The color payoff is great and they do an honorable job of lining your lips and keeping whatever you put on top of them in place. I will say that these can be a bit drying and can tug on your lips (or require some work to get the color payoff that they are capable of), but for the price that's really not a problem. I know that if I wanted a smooth-as-silk lip liner I would be buying it from a high-end line like Dior or Armani. These really are great for the price and it can be a good thing that they need some tug to go on: it means that once they're on, they aren't going anywhere!
faceoff_negative.headline: I love the shade range...
